btnOpenLogfile.label: Open Logfile.txt
btnOpenLogfile.tooltip: Opens the 'Logfile.txt' when you enabled this option and checked the versions once.

cbShowInLog.label: Notifications per Chatbot Log
cbShowInLog.tooltip: If you want the bot to write in the Log (under Scripts).

cbWriteInLogfile.label: Notifications in a Logfile.txt
cbWriteInLogfile.tooltip: If you want the bot to write in the 'Logfile.txt' in the 'UpdateNotifier' folder.

cbSendAsChatMsg.label: Notifications per Twitch Chat
cbSendAsChatMsg.tooltip: If you want the bot to write in the Twitch chat.

cbSendAsWhisper.label: Notifications per Twitch Whisper
cbSendAsWhisper.tooltip: If you want the bot to write you per whisper message on Twitch.

cbNotifyOnSuccess.label: Notify me on success
cbNotifyOnSuccess.tooltip: If you want a response message even when no changes exists

btnCheckVersions.label: Check script versions
btnCheckVersions.tooltip: Checks the versions of your scripts.
